Equipment Actions.Action 1: Battleaxe, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Morningstar, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Piercing

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Ettin makes 2 attacks, one with its Battleaxe and one with its Morningstar

Abilities.Ability 1: Two Heads, With its two heads, the Ettin has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks and on saving throws against being blinded, charmed, deafened, frightened, stunned and knocked unconscious
Abilities.Ability 2: Wakeful, The Ettin is able to sleep one head at a time.  Talk about sleeping with one eye open!
